//home page strings Real Talk Welcome to Real Talk! Enter your mobile phone number Enter your password SUBMIT (012)3456789 password New User Sign In
//real talk introduction information page Welcome to Real Talk, the purpose of this application is for you to send a list of descriptors of how you are feeling or questions you might have regarding your health to a medical professional. Expected Time Frame: In 1-2 weeks, you will receive an informational package personalized based on your profile that will help you learn. Disclaimer: All the information sent to you is purely for educational purposes. Real Talk is not a proper medical diagnosis. Please see your local doctor if you have an emergency medical issue. NEXT
//second page - new user registration strings Name Mobile Number New User Registration Age 21 Gender Anything else you would like me to know? male/female/non binary ex. sexually active, pregnancy test, \nuse contraception ex. //Case dates Case 6 ---- Submitted: Five Days Ago Case 5 ---- Submitted: Three Days Ago Case 4 ---- Submitted: Two Hours Ago Case 1 ---- Info: Pregnancy Case 2 ---- Info: Child Health Case 1 ---- Submitted: 1 Minute Ago //Information Pages What to do next? DONE PLAY STOP //Pregnancy Pregnancy, also known as gestation, is the time during which one or more offspring develops inside a woman. A multiple pregnancy involves more than one offspring, such as with twins.Pregnancy can occur by sexual intercourse or assisted reproductive technology. A pregnancy may end in a live birth, abortion, or miscarriage, though access to safe abortion care varies globally. - Missed period\n- Tender, swollen breasts\n- Nausea with or without vomiting\n- Morning sickness\n - Increased urination\n- Fatigue\n Make a prenatal appointment, Consult your provider about medications you are taking, If you smoke, quit, Stop drinking alcohol, Make sure your activities are pregnancy-safe
